name: The Potion of Life
description: The Potion of Life is a 2D dungeon crawler where the user plays as Vaxlemor, a wizard who travels through a series of dungeon floors the obtain The Potion of Life guarded by the powerful goblin king Glubb-Nub. The player uses Vaxlemor's array of spells and his special teleport ability to defeat numerous enemies and minibosses.
